#summary Quick overwiev of the content of the configuration file

The following is a list of all configuration options in the configuration file

*A*
 * [AccessControlConfig access]
 * [Attributes attributes]
 * [Attributes entity.defaultarp]
 * [GeneralConfig admin.name]
 * [GeneralConfig admin.email]
 * [GeneralConfig auth]
 * [MetadataExport aggregators]
*C*
 * ca_bundle_file
 * cron (Deprecated in version 1.10)
 * cert.strict.validation
 * cert.allowed.warnings
*D*
 * dashboard.inbox.paginate_by
*E*
 * entity.prettyname
 * enable.saml20-sp
 * enable.saml20-idp
 * enable.shib13-sp
 * enable.shib13-idp
 * entity.useblacklist
 * entity.usewhitelist
 * export.external
 * export.entitiesDescriptorName
*M*
 * [Metadata metadatafields.saml20-idp]
 * [Metadata metadatafields.saml20-sp]
 * [Metadata metadatafields.shib13-idp]
 * [Metadata metadatafields.shib13-sp]
 * metadata_refresh_cron_tags
 * [ExternalMessenger messenger.external]
 * maxCache
 * maxDuration
 * messenger.default
*N*
 * notify.cert.expiring.before
 * notify.meta.expiring.before
*S*
 * [GeneralConfig store]
 * sign.enable
 * sign.privatekey
 * sign.privatekey_pass
 * sign.certificate
*U*
 * [GeneralConfig useridattr]
 * [GeneralConfig user.autocreate]
 * usertypes
*V*
 * validate_entity_certificate_cron_tags
 * validate_entity_endpoints_cron_tags
*W*
 * [Workflows workflowstates]
 * [Workflows workflowstate.default]
 * [Workflows workflow_states]
